data.headline: Backend Engineer with Expertise in Cloud Infrastructure
data.summary: Experienced Backend Engineer with a strong background in cloud infrastructure and microservices development. Proficient in designing and implementing scalable and highly available systems using modern technologies and best practices. Passionate about continuous improvement and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

experience.title: Backend Engineer
bullets: Designed and implemented a scalable microservices architecture on AWS, leveraging services like EC2, ECS, and RDS.
Developed and maintained high-performance APIs using Python, Flask, and FastAPI, ensuring reliable and efficient data processing.
Automated infrastructure provisioning and deployment using Terraform, reducing manual effort and improving consistency.
Participated in the implementation of a CI/CD pipeline, enabling seamless integration and continuous delivery of new features.

experience.title: Junior Backend Developer
bullets: Contributed to the development and maintenance of a Django-based web application, ensuring reliable and scalable performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and address technical challenges, improving overall system stability.
Participated in code reviews and pair programming sessions, fostering knowledge sharing and best practices.

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: Developed a personal blog using Python, Flask, and SQLite, featuring a content management system and user authentication.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Wear a collared shirt, neutral background, friendly expression.
